posts.post_text: September 28, 2015 at 6:09 PM#2this is only possible if your macrolines does not need to contain quotesStore 1.macro.macrolineAssign 1.macro.macroline /cmd="macro line content"e.g. possible:Channel 1 at 50CodeStore Macro 1.2.1Assign Macro 1.2.1 /cmd="Channel 1 at 50"e.g. not possible:Label Group 1 "Blue Pars"CodeStore Macro 1.2.1Assign Macro 1.2.1 /cmd="Label Group 1 "[color=#FF0000]Blue Pars""[/color]
